section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce in No. 74-107, Preiser, Commissioner of Correctional Services of New York against Newkirk.

And for reasons stated in an opinion filed today, the judgment of the Court of Appeals of the Second Circuit is vacated and remanded to that Court with directions that the complaint be dismissed by the District Court as moot.
Mr. Justice Marshall filed a concurring statement.
Mr. Justice Douglas filed a dissenting statement.
